review: The fire stick bought on Prime Day was a GREAT PURCHASE.  I have PS3 so a lot of the same features can be had on there but for 25 bucks I really couldn't go wrong.  If I didn't have a PS this little gadget would be invaluable...I can watch my HBOgo, Netflix, ESPN, and all the free services available are cool as well.  Different sports channels, games, apps, all in this little device.  WOW.  I was going to buy a ChromeCast a while back, I'm really REALLY glad I held out.  The stick seems to be well made, I like the sleek remote, I like everything about it...If you don't have something like it...look into it.
